param.summary: name: catalog name id: catname ucd: meta.id;meta.table datatype: char arraysize: * description: the name of the line catalog this entry was drawn from
name: molecular formula id: molformula ucd: phys.atmol.element datatype: char arraysize: * description: The molecular formula which may include notation of the common quantum state of the transition
name: molecule type id: moltype datatype: int description: The type of molecular given as an integer identifier
name: quantum numbers id: QNs ucd: phys.atmol.transition;spect.line datatype: char arraysize: * description: The initial and final quantum number states that produces this line
name: frequency id: frequency ucd: em.freq;spect.line datatype: double unit: MHz description: The molecular formula which may include notation of the common quantum state of the transition
name: frequency recommended id: recommended datatype: int description: an integer flag indicating whether this record provides the recommended frequency for this line.
